title: YouTube CEO Says Battling ‘AI Slop’ a Top Priority in 2026

title: AI will augment doctors' capabilities, not replace them: Anupriya Patel
description: New Delhi, Jan 21 (PTI) Artificial Intelligence is not intended to replace doctors, but to augment their capabilities, help bridge gaps arising from the shortage of medical professionals and address the growing burden of patients, Union Minister Anupriya Patel said on Wednesday. Launching an online training programme on artificial intelligence (AI) in medical education, the […]

title: Republicans Push AI Chip Export Bill Amidst Controversy
